item.title: The French are fine now
item.description: French passport holders can now make use the of 5-Days-Shenzhen-Visa. Cost is the regular RMB 168 Same rules apply, you need to have already a China stamp in your passport â€“ if not no visa! If your passport is new and you have any old passport with a China stamp in it, bring it! That is acceptable.
